content:
What do you consider the correct presentation to be? Table view instead of cards? Click on the icon that looks like a film roll at top right and see your options. Something else?

There are many layout options. I don't see a reason to think that your profile is bad.
creator: mozilla98

content: Hi Rick, Thanks for the quick response. The commands for "write" and "get messages" used to be on the toolbar. Now they are missing. I can still do those commands using the cloud icon and the +New Message control. Those two were not present previously.
creator: k3pto

content: Right click next to the search bar at the top, select "Customize", put your preferred functions on it.
